resource_dependency.authAPI: RESTful authentication API with endpoints for register, login, logout, and session management

function: Enable secure user registration and login for female participants to access the health survey platform.
static_description: A centered card layout with a whitesmoke background and dark cyan header displaying 'Health Survey Portal'. The form contains labeled input fields for email/password on login view or full registration details on sign-up view, along with action buttons ('Login' / 'Register'). A toggle link allows switching between views.

interaction_and_states.description: Tapping 'Register' switches view to show extended registration form; tapping 'Login' returns to login-only form.
Validates inputs against rules including gender restriction. On success, redirects authenticated user to dashboard; shows error messages otherwise.

resource_dependency.surveyDataSchema: Database table with columns: survey_id (UUID), title (string), description (text), created_at (timestamp), due_date (nullable timestamp)
resource_dependency.submissionStatusSchema: Table linking user_id and survey_id with status enum: not_started, in_progress, submitted, approved

function: Provide an overview interface where users can see available health surveys and check their individual submission statuses.
static_description: Two-panel layout featuring a left-aligned list of survey cards showing titles, brief descriptions, and icons from resource_dependency, alongside a right panel listing previous submissions indicating current status using badges styled in dark cyan.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a survey card navigates to that specific multi-page survey form; clicking a submission entry opens detailed view of responses.

resource_dependency.formStatePersistenceAPI: Endpoint for saving partial progress per user-survey combination

function: Deliver a structured, paginated questionnaire experience supporting diverse input methods tailored to collecting health data effectively.
static_description: Multi-step form displayed one page at a time, each containing grouped questions based on type definitions. Navigation controls appear below content area, showing dynamic pagination indicator derived from total number of pages.

interaction_and_states.description: 'Next' moves forward through pages unless validation errors exist; 'Previous' returns without validating. 'Save Draft' stores current answers via persistence API then confirms save locally.

resource_dependency.errorMessagingStyle: Inline red text beneath invalid fields
resource_dependency.formValidationLibrary: Built-in client-side validator triggered after every keystroke/change

function: Ensure accurate data entry by providing immediate feedback when mandatory fields are missing or incorrectly formatted during form completion.
static_description: Each input field includes optional asterisk marking required items. Real-time inline warnings appear directly under respective fields upon losing focus if criteria aren't met, styled according to errorMessagingStyle.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers instant evaluation of associated validation rules. Invalid entries display custom message strings while disabling forward navigation until corrected.

resource_dependency.localDraftResumeAPI: GET endpoint retrieving previously stored incomplete responses tied to active session

function: Permit temporary suspension and later resumption of partially completed surveys without loss of entered information.
static_description: Form footer includes additional control labeled 'Save Draft', distinct visually but aligned consistently with primary navigation elements. Upon activation, confirmation message briefly overlays screen center.

interaction_and_states.description: Serializes all current form values into JSON payload sent to localDraftResumeAPI. Displays transient success notification overlay before redirecting back to dashboard or preserving context within same tab.

resource_dependency.confirmationScreenContent: Thank you for completing your submission. Your reference number is {reference_number}. Please keep this safe.
resource_dependency.submissionTrackingDatabaseSchema: New table storing submission_id (auto-generated UUID), reference_number (unique string), user_id, survey_id, submitted_at (timestamp)

function: Acknowledge successful receipt of user-submitted survey data by issuing a traceable unique identifier.
static_description: Full-screen confirmation modal featuring large bold rendering of generated HS-###### reference code surrounded by supportive copy text sourced from confirmationScreenContent, plus prominent call-to-action directing return to main dashboard.

interaction_and_states.description: Pressing 'Return to Dashboard' button dismisses confirmation screen and updates browser location accordingly, simultaneously logging event in submission tracking schema.

resource_dependency.CRUDOperationsEndpoints: Standard REST routes (/surveys/:id) enabling GET, PUT, DELETE operations scoped to administrator privileges

function: Empower administrative staff to inspect, modify, and remove submitted participant responses securely.
static_description: Admin-focused interface presenting sortable/filterable grid resembling spreadsheet populated with dataTableColumns. Sidebar navigation provides quick access to core management tasks such as viewing, editing, or deleting entries.

interaction_and_states.description: Choosing row-specific actions triggers corresponding HTTP request targeting CRUDOperationsEndpoints. Successful edits update displayed records instantly; deletions prompt secondary confirmation dialog prior to execution.

resource_dependency.permissionMatrixStorage: Roles assigned via relational mapping between user_id and role_type enums in centralized permissions table
resource_dependency.authorizationMiddleware: JWT-based middleware verifying claims against defined roleDefinitions before granting route access

function: Enforce granular access restrictions ensuring only authorized individuals perform designated functions across both frontend interfaces and backend systems.
static_description: Hidden-by-default sections become accessible depending on decoded JWT contents which dictate visibility of protected UI components like admin menus or restricted dashboards. No visible cues distinguish these states externally.

interaction_and_states.description: Requests to guarded paths invoke authorizationMiddleware checks comparing token scopes with roleDefinitions matrix. Unauthorized attempts redirect to general access-denied landing page.

resource_dependency.reviewDecisionWebhook: POST endpoint accepting reviewer decisions and appending outcome + notes to original record metadata

function: Facilitate verification procedures wherein qualified reviewers assess authenticity and completeness of incoming health submissions prior to formal processing.
static_description: Dedicated workspace resembling expanded version of standard response viewer augmented with dedicated panel housing decision-making tools including binary approval toggle, optional rejection textbox, and chronological audit log feed.

interaction_and_states.description: Hitting either 'Approve' or 'Reject' button packages reviewer selections into structured payload dispatched to reviewDecisionWebhook, updating underlying workflow state accordingly and refreshing UI representation immediately afterward.

resource_dependency.chartRenderingEngine: D3.js library configured for bar graphs, pie charts, trend lines
resource_dependency.analyticsAggregationService: Backend microservice aggregating anonymized survey metrics grouped by selected filters

function: Visualize compiled statistical insights drawn from accumulated health survey datasets, offering customizable filtering options and export capabilities.
static_description: Tabbed report interface showcasing interactive D3-powered visualizations arranged horizontally beneath filter controls positioned atop viewport. Export toolbar appears fixed at bottom edge permitting download in supported file formats.

interaction_and_states.description: Adjustments made to any filter option trigger AJAX query sent to analyticsAggregationService resulting in updated chart renderings reflecting refined dataset scope.
Activating desired format initiates server-side generation process leveraging pre-defined templates returning downloadable file attachment ready for user consumption.

resource_dependency.keyManagementPolicy: Rotated monthly using AWS KMS integration
resource_dependency.databaseConnectionSettings: TLS-enabled PostgreSQL instance hosted behind VPC firewall enforcing strict IAM policies

function: Maintain confidentiality and integrity of sensitive medical information gathered through the platform utilizing industry-standard cryptographic protections combined with hardened infrastructure configurations.
static_description: No direct user-facing elements involved; entire implementation resides beneath application surface layer ensuring transparent operation invisible to end-users while meeting regulatory compliance standards.

interaction_and_states.description: All newly inserted rows undergo automatic encryption procedure applying AES-256-CBC cipher managed via keyManagementPolicy prior to physical storage inside secured PostgreSQL environment governed by databaseConnectionSettings.

resource_dependency.mediaQueryBreakpoints: { mobile: max-width 768px, tablet: min-width 769px and max-width 1024px, desktop: min-width 1025px }
resource_dependency.responsiveComponentBehavior: Flexible grids adapting column count, font scaling adjustments, touch-friendly tap targets

function: Optimize usability and readability regardless of device category by dynamically adjusting layout proportions, typography sizing, and interactive element dimensions.
static_description: Uniform aesthetic maintained across breakpoints incorporating fluidly resizing containers, adaptive spacing ratios, scalable fonts adhering to WCAG accessibility guidelines, and appropriately sized touch targets suitable for fingers rather than cursors.

interaction_and_states.description: Window dimension changes cause CSS media queries to evaluate triggering reflows governed by mediaQueryBreakpoints configuration causing structural shifts aligning with optimal mobile/tablet/desktop presentation paradigms.

function: Establish consistent visual identity throughout application leveraging prescribed color scheme applied uniformly across all stylistic properties including backgrounds, borders, text highlights, and interactive states.
static_description: Entire site rendered against whitesmoke backdrop (#F5F5F5) complemented by dark cyan accents (#008B8B) manifested in headers, links, buttons, selection indicators, hover effects, and focus rings ensuring cohesive branding presence.

interaction_and_states.description: Mouse hovering over clickable regions results in subtle shade variations derived from globalColorPalette maintaining harmony while enhancing discoverability without compromising accessibility contrast ratios.

resource_dependency.historyDisplayFormat: List view grouping past surveys chronologically with status tags
resource_dependency.personalInfoUpdateAPI: PATCH endpoint modifying user attributes linked to authenticated account

function: Allow registered members to maintain up-to-date contact information and monitor historical engagement patterns related to prior survey participation.
static_description: Split-pane layout placing editable personal details form on left side juxtaposed against vertically scrollable timeline of completed/pending surveys listed chronologically on right half, each marked clearly with status badge.

interaction_and_states.description: Modifying any field enables 'Save Changes' CTA which when clicked serializes altered values into PATCH request directed toward personalInfoUpdateAPI concluding with optimistic UI refresh synchronized with latest persisted data.

resource_dependency.auditTrailEntrySchema: { timestamp: ISO8601 datetime, actor: user/admin ID, action: string description, affected_record: survey/user ID }
resource_dependency.auditLogDatabaseTable: Separate indexed table capturing granular transactional events linked to sensitive data manipulations

function: Record comprehensive activity logs documenting who accessed what information and when, particularly focusing on privileged operations involving protected health records.
static_description: Dedicated administrative module displaying sortable tabular audit trail indexed by descending timestamps. Filters located above table allow narrowing displayed entries based on predefined categories facilitating forensic investigations.

interaction_and_states.description: Updating any filter criterion executes filtered search against auditLogDatabaseTable returning subset matching specified conditions thereby reducing noise and improving investigative efficiency.
